column2: Pact.Pg <- ggplot(Pact, aes(x=Date, y = Pgross.mean, group = Treatment, color = Treatment)) +
xlab("Date") + theme(axis.text.x=element_text(angle=60, hjust=1)) + # x-axis label and rotating text on x axis
ylab("Gross Photosynthetic Rate (umol/cm2/hr)") + ylim(c(0, 4.5)) + # y-axis label and y axis range
